Remote Work is one of the big opportunities for rural areas.

Every small town will discuss their remote work strategy in the next 1-5 years

And most don’t know what to do other than offer relocation bonus. #requestforstartup

Tulsa & Vermont lead the wayCornwall out to entice remote tech workers | CBC News
Cornwall, Ont., once one of the province's major manufacturing centres, is looking to reinvent itself as a hub for remote tech workers. 
cbc.ca

I've quoted 
@dpup
 before abt remote work, & I'll do it over & over again: "The problems at work haven't changed. Going remote just makes clear what was hidden when co-located."

@bhadrasandeepThere’s decades of professional and social networking theory on groups, cliques, and weak-vs-strong ties, all of which apply to how we work, and none of which LinkedIn leverages 5/

For all our collective ‘future of work’ opining, I’m surprised we haven’t founded or funded anything that resembles how we actually work. This at a time when more and more people treat careers as portfolios of projects vs. a linear treadmill /fin #requestforstartup

Most colleges are planning to teach in person rather than online in the fall.

It would be interesting to know precisely what they think is going to change between now and then. An effective treatment? Better testing? Or just "uh, something?"Here’s Our List of Colleges’ Reopening Models
The Chronicle is teaming up with Davidson College’s College Crisis Initiative, which has collected reopening models for nearly 3,000 institutions, to present a fuller view of the fall.
chronicle.com

If re-opening is the only way they are staying alive as an institution... that’s ofc what they’ll do. 

#requestforstartup
We need more creative ways of making online edu social — and this is not just a #covid problem but a general #onlinelearning problem
"I wish I had more time to read!" she says as she browses social media for four hours straight

Solution: put things you'd like to read on social media. Like someone should have books via tweet, post, pic, etc. That way you can waste time doing what you actually WANT to do, and no one will be the wiser. #bigBrain #requestForStartup
